summary: Test suite for the alarm control panel component, covering manual and MQTT based panels as well as the Vanderbilt SPC integration. It validates arming/disarming logic, code verification, pending and triggered states, timing delays, MQTT command/state topics, and configuration error handling.
business_intent: Guarantee that alarm control panel integrations work reliably within Home Assistant, providing secure and correctly functioning alarm features for endâ€‘users.
